Name: The Asher Asylum
About the game: Explore the abandoned Asher Asylum in an effort to find a missing cop. Learn about the horrors plaguing the old asylum, and try to find a way to stop its cursed residents from leaving. This indie horror FPS is designed as a throw-back to the late 2000s indie horror scene, complete with collectibles, pages of lore, inventory management, clunky combat, and multiple endings, all intended to capture the glory days of internet horror games, both the good parts and the bad parts.
